# SPAT Mixing Engine

SPAT Revolution mixing engine takes advantage of object-based mixing. Such engine are generally presented in to part :

+ First, you have the *objects* (callen **Sources** in SPAT Revolution), which will hold all the mixing informations

In _SPAT Revolution_, spatialization of virtual sources takes places inside _Rooms_. To enter a room and open its graphic editor environment, double-click on a room module in the Setup graph, or select a room tab from the Navigation bar.
